txt.en:
'I think we have just enough here to do what we must. The next step is to sort the pipe-weed out. We've got a couple of barrels over there.

'Pipeweed gets sorted by the quality and size of the leaf. The larger the leaf, the subtler and softer the taste. The smaller the leaf, the stronger and more bitter the flavour.

'Use the three bins to sort out the pipe-weed you picked earlier.'
'Everything is sorted? And not a leaf out of place, I hope.'
'Don't put the wrong leaves in the wrong barrel. There is nothing worse than a nice taste of smooth interrupted by a shot of bitter.'
Pipe-weed is something hobbits take very seriously. A market would never be visited unless it had a suitable supply and variety.
The pipe-weed barrels are next to Blossom Gamgee.\n\nThe pipe-weed needs to be sorted before it can be dried.
Blossom Gamgee is at the Northcotton Farm.\n\nBlossom Gamgee will want to know that the pipe-weed has been sorted.
